title: Opinion diefied [sic]. Discouering the ingins, traps, and traynes, that are set in this age, whereby to catch opinon. Neither florished with art, nor smoothed with flatterie. By B.R. Gentleman, seruant to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.
author: Rich, Barnabe, 1540?-1617.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by Thomas Dawson] for Thomas Adams,
